description: Shared Services Canada requires 2 SignalTEK10G or equivalent products. Final submission date is November 22, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. For requests & info: raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca.
full_summary:
# SignalTEK10G Pro for Shared Services Canada

## Notification Details
Shared Services Canada is soliciting bids for the purchase of SignalTEK10G Pro equipment through a competitive request for proposal process.

* **Solicitation Reference Number**: SSC-22-00020752:T
* **Solicitation Title**: SignalTEK10G Pro for Shared Services Canada
* **Publication Date**: November 16, 2022
* **Closing Date and Time**: November 22, 2022 @ 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)

## Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category**: General Devices (GD)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Delivery Areas**: Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR)

## Proposal Evaluation Criteria
* **Selection Criteria**: Not specified
* **Evaluation Method**: Competitive – open bidding

## Contact Information
Raiyane Benchekroun
raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
613-324-4061
(613) 960-6007 (fax)
Raiyane Benchekroun
180 rue Kent St, 13 Floor, Ottawa, ON, K1G 4A8

## Proposal Documents
The solicitation package, including the amendment, is available on the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Public Procurement Portal. Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to the contact person above.

## Notice URL and Attachments
The solicitation package and amendment are available at the following URL:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/0A1C8CCE-D3A9-47E6-9EC2-7E1FF618F261
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/06CE8613-AEF0-4511-B58B-C0F24287985A

## Description
The proposed equipment will be used by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for its operations. Suppliers are invited to submit their proposals for the purchase and deployment of the SignalTEK10G Pro (or equivalent product) equipment from trusted vendors. Please note that the proposed equipment must meet the SSC requirements specified in the solicitation package. Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to the contact person above.
